pkgmetadata.longdescription: django-bulk-tracker===============[![Build Status](https://github.com/hassaanalansary/django-bulk-tracker/actions/workflows/tests.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/hassaanalansary/django-bulk-tracker/actions)Run tests==========```shellpip install -r requirements_dev.txtpytest```Contribute----------If you have great ideas for django-bulk-tracker, or if you like to improve something,feel free to fork this repository and/or create a pull request. I'm open for suggestions. If you like to discuss something with me (about django-bulk-tracker), please open an issue.#### GitHub repository: https://github.com/hassaanalansary/django-bulk-tracker#### issue tracker: https://github.com/hassaanalansary/django-bulk-tracker/issues
